entry.name: OSG_US_Clemson-Palmetto_condce
entry.comment: Added 2015-07-27 as replacement for old GRAM CE --Brendan; 2016-06-08 moved from noncms-osg, requested in GOC30132 --Marian

per_entry.comment: Lower glidein limits while HTCondor-CE's new PBS Pro support is tested.

entry.name: OSG_US_Clemson-Palmetto_condce_mcore
entry.comment: Entry created on 2016/04/07 -- Marty; 2016-06-08 moved from noncms-osg, requested in GOC30132 --Marian

per_entry.comment: Lower glidein limits while HTCondor-CE's new PBS Pro support is tested.

attr.name: GLIDEIN_Job_Max_Time
attr.comment: low because of atlas requirement for opportunistic usage; increased from 6hrs per agreement Fermilab VO admins; -Marian

attr.name: GLIDEIN_Max_Walltime
attr.comment: low because of atlas requirement for opportunistic usage; increased from 8hrs per agreement Fermilab VO admins; -Marian

attr.name: GLIDEIN_Resource_Slots
attr.comment: try just adding to main partitionable slot
